explains: n. 法令，政令；裁定，判决

sentences.en: The decree imposed strict censorship of the media.
sentences.cn: 这个法令强制实行严格的媒体审查制度。

sentences.en: An official decree invalidated the vote in the capital.
sentences.cn: 一项官方法令使首都的投票失去了效力。

sentences.en: In July he issued a decree ordering all unofficial armed groups in the country to disband.
sentences.cn: 7月份，他颁布了一项法令，命令解散该国所有非官方武装团体。
